name: Attic Panic
description:
Blast away your enemies with ricochet napalm tank shells. Collect their essence to finish the ritual before anyone else. The entity demands it!

The ritual is divided into rounds, for each round 10 essences have to be collected in order to finish a game round. At the end of each game round, players get upgrades from the entity. Use these upgrades to do your enemies out and collect the most essence.
